arabicText: فَٱسْتَقِمْ كَمَآ أُمِرْتَ وَمَن تَابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَطْغَوْا۟ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore remain	 firm	 the	 way	 you	 are	
commanded	 to,	 and	 those	 who	 have	
turned	along	with	you,	and	O	people	- do	
not	rebel;	indeed	He	is	seeing	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	qāim	raho	jaisā		tumheiñ	ḥukm		hai	aur	
jo	 tumhāre	 sāth	 ruju’	 lāyā	 hai	 aur	 aey	
logo!	 Sarkashi	 na	 karo	 be-shak	 woh	
tumhāre	kām	dekh	rahā	hai

arabicText: وَلَا تَرْكَنُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ فَتَمَسَّكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	incline	towards	the	unjust,	for	
the	 fire	 will	 touch	 you	 - and	 you	 do	 not	
have	 any	 supporter	 other	 than	 Allah -
then	you	will	not	be	helped.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	zālimoñ	ki	 taraf		na	jhuko	ke	 tumheñ	
āg	chuyegi	aur	Allāh	ke	siwā	 tumhārā	koi	
himāyati	nahiñ	phir	madad	na	pāoge.

arabicText: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَىِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْحَسَنَـٰتِ يُذْهِبْنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكْرَىٰ لِلذَّٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 keep	 the	 prayer	 established	 at	 the	
two	ends	of	 the	day	and	in	some	parts	of	
the	night;	indeed	good	deeds	wipe	out	the	
evil	deeds;	this	is	an	advice	to	those	who	heed	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Namāz	 qāim	 rakho	 din	 ke	 donoñ	
kināroñ	 aur	 kuch rāt	 ke	 hissoñ	 meiñ	 beshak	 nekiyān	 burāiyoñ	 ko	 mitā	 deti	 haiñ
yeh	nasihat	hai	nasihat	mānne	wāloñ	ko.

arabicText: وَٱصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	have	patience,	for	Allah does	not	waste	the	wages	of	the	righteous.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	sabr	karo	ke	Allāh	nekoñ	ka	neg	(Ájr)	zā’e	nahiñ	kartā.

arabicText: فَلَوْلَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرُونِ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ أُو۟لُوا۟ بَقِيَّةٍۢ يَنْهَوْنَ عَنِ ٱلْفَسَادِ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا مِّمَّنْ أَنجَيْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۗ وَٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مَآ أُتْرِفُوا۟ فِيهِ وَكَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	why	were	not	there	some	people,	from	the	generations	before	you,	who	had	some	goodness	
remaining	in	them	in	order	to	prevent	(others)	from	causing	turmoil	in	the	earth?	Except	a	few	
among	 them	- the	 very	 ones	whom	We	 had	 rescued;	and	 the	 unjust	 remained	pursuing	what	
they	were	given,	and	they	were	guilty
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kyuñ	na	huye	 tum	se	agli	sangatoñ	(Qaumoñ)	meiñ	aise	jin	meiñ	bhalāi	kā	kuch hissā	lagā	
rahā	hotā	ke	zameen	meiñ	 fasād	se	rokte?	Hāñ	un	meiñ	 thode	 the wohi	jinko	ham	ne	najāt	di	
aur	zālim	usi	’aesh	ke	peeche	pade	rahe	jo	unheiñ	diyā	gayā	aur	woh	gunahgār	the

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهْلِكَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ بِظُلْمٍۢ وَأَهْلُهَا مُصْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 your	 Lord	 is	 not	 such	 as	 to	 destroy	 townships	 without	 reason,	 while	 their	 people	 are	
righteous.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	tumhārā	Rab	aisa	nahiñ	ke	bastiyoñ	ko	be	wajah	halāk	kar	de	aur	un	ke	log	achche	hoñ.

arabicText: وَلَوْ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ ۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخْتَلِفِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	your	Lord	willed,	He	would	have	
made	mankind	one	nation	- and	 they	will	
always	keep	differing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur agar	 tumhārā	 Rab	 chāhtā	 to	 sab	
ādmiyoñ	ko	ek	hi	ummat	kar	detā	aur	woh	
hameshā	ikhtilāf	meiñ	raheñ	ge

arabicText: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَ ۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمْ ۗ وَتَمَّتْ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Except	 those	 upon	 whom	 your	 Lord	 had	
mercy;	 and	 this	is	 why	 He	 created	 them;	
and	 the	 Word	 of	 your	 Lord	 has	 been	
concluded	 that,	 “Indeed	 I	 will,	 surely,	 fill	
hell	with	jinns	and	men	combined.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	jin	par	tumhāre	Rab	ne	rahem	kiya	
aur	 log	 isi	 liye	 banāye	 haiñ	 aur	 tumhāre	
Rab	 ki	 bāt	 poori	 ho	 chuki	 ke	 be-shak	
zaroor	Jahannam	bhar	dooñ	ga	jinnoñ	aur	
ādmiyoñ	ko	milā	kar

arabicText: وَكُلًّۭا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَ ۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَوْعِظَةٌۭ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	 relate	 to	 you	 all	 the	 accounts	 of	
Noble	Messengers,	in	order	to	steady	your	
heart	 with	 it;	 and	 in	 this	 the	 truth	 has	
come	 to	 you,	 and	 for	 the	 Muslims	 a	
preaching	and	advice.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 sab	 kuch Ham	 tumheñ	 Rasooloñ	 ki	
khabreñ	 sunāte	 haiñ	 jis	 se	 tumhārā	 dil	
thehrāyeñ	aur	is	soorat	meiñ	tumhāre	pās	
Haq	 āayā	 aur	 Musalmānoñ	 ko	 pand-onasihat

arabicText: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنَّا عَـٰمِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	say	to	the	disbelievers,	“Keep	on	with	
your	 works	 in	 your	 places;	 we	 are	
carrying	out	ours.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfiroñ	se	farmāo	tum	apni	jagah	kām	
kiye	jāo	ham	apnā	kām	karte	haiñ
Aur	rāh	dekho	ham	bhi	rāh	dekhte	haiñ

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ غَيْبُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُ ٱلْأَمْرُ كُلُّهُۥ فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَيْهِ ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 for	Allah only	are	 the	 hidden	 of	 the	
heavens	 and	 of	 the	 earth,	 and	 towards	
Him	 only	 is	 the	 return	 of	 all	 matters	 -
therefore	worship	Him	and	trust	Him;	and	
your	Lord	is	not	unaware	of	what	you	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allāh	 hi	 ke	 liye	 haiñ	 āsmānoñ	 aur	
zameen	 ke	 ghaib	 aur	 usi	 ki	 taraf	 sab	
kamoñ	 ki	 ruju’	 hai	 to	 us	 ki	 bandagi	 karo	
aur	 us	 par	 bharosā	 rakho	 aur	 tumhārā	
Rab	tumhāre	kamoñ	se	ghāfil	nahiñ

englishTranslationText:
Alif-Lam-Ra	*;	these	are	verses	of	the	clear	
Book.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Alif-Lam-Ra*;	 Yeh	 Raushan	 Kitāb	 ki	
Āayateñ	haiñ

arabicText: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَٰنًا عَرَبِيًّۭا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	We	have	sent	down	an	Arabic	Qur’an,	so	that	you	may	perceive.
romanUrduTranslationText: . Be-shak Ham	ne	isey	Arabi	Qur'ān	utārā	ke	tum	samjho

arabicText: نَحْنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيْكَ أَحْسَنَ ٱلْقَصَصِ بِمَآ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ وَإِن كُنتَ مِن قَبْلِهِۦ لَمِنَ ٱلْغَـٰفِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
We	relate	to	you	the	best	narrative	because	We	have	sent	the	divine	revelation	of	this	Qur’an,	to	
you;	although	surely	you	were	unaware	before	this.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ham	tumheiñ	sab	se	achchā	bayān	sunāte	haiñ	is	liye	ke	ham	ne	tumhāri	taraf	is	Qur'ān	ki	waḥi	
bheji	agarche	be-shak		us	se	pehle	tumheñ	khabar	na	thi

arabicText: إِذْ قَالَ يُوسُفُ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى رَأَيْتُ أَحَدَ عَشَرَ كَوْكَبًۭا وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ رَأَيْتُهُمْ لِى سَـٰجِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Remember	when	Yusuf	(Joseph)	said	to	his	father,	“O	my	father!	I	saw	eleven	stars	and	the	sun	
and	the	moon	- I	saw	them	prostrating	to	me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yād karo	jab	Yūsuf ne	apne	bāp	se	kahā	aey	mere	bāp!	Maiñ	ne	giyārah	tāre	aur	suraj	aur	chāñd	
dekhe	unheiñ	apne	liye	sajda	karte	dekhā

arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ لَا تَقْصُصْ رُءْيَاكَ عَلَىٰٓ إِخْوَتِكَ فَيَكِيدُوا۟ لَكَ كَيْدًا ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ عَدُوٌّۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “O my	 child!	 Do	 not	 relate	 your	
dream	 to	 your	 brothers,	 for	 they	 will	
hatch	 a	 plot	 against	 you;	 indeed	 Satan	 is	
an	open	enemy	towards	mankind.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kahā	 aey	 mere	 bachche!	 Apna	 khwāb	
apne	 bhāiyoñ	 se	 na	 kahnā	 ke	 woh	 tere	
sāth	 koi	 chāl	 chaleñ ge	 be-shak	 shaitān	
ādmi	ka	khulā	dushman	hai

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَجْتَبِيكَ رَبُّكَ وَيُعَلِّمُكَ مِن تَأْوِيلِ ٱلْأَحَادِيثِ وَيُتِمُّ نِعْمَتَهُۥ عَلَيْكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ ءَالِ يَعْقُوبَ كَمَآ أَتَمَّهَا عَلَىٰٓ أَبَوَيْكَ مِن قَبْلُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. “And	 this	 is	 how	 your	 Lord	 will	 choose	
you	 and	 teach	 you	 how	 to	 interpret	
events,	and	will	 perfect	His	 favours	 upon	
you	 and	 upon	 the	 family	 of	 Yaqub,	 the	
way	 He	 perfected	 it	 upon	 both	 your	
forefathers,	 Ibrahim	 and	 Ishaq;	 indeed	
your	Lord	is	All	Knowing,	Wise.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	isi	tarah	tujhe	terā	Rab	chun	lega	aur	
tujhe	 bātoñ	 ka	 anjām	 nikālnā	 sikhāyega	
aur	tujh	par	apni	ne’mat	poori	kare	ga	aur	
Yāqoob ke	 ghar	 wāloñ	 par	 jis	 tarah	 tere	
pehle	 donoñ	 bāp	 dādā	Ibrāhim aur	Ishāq
par	 poori	 ki	 bes-hak	 terā	 Rab	 ‘ilm-ohikmat		wāla	hai.

arabicText: ۞ لَّقَدْ كَانَ فِى يُوسُفَ وَإِخْوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَـٰتٌۭ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	in	Yusuf	and	his	brothers	are	signs	
*	 for	 those	 who	 enquire	 **.	 (*	 Of	 the	
truthfulness	 of	 Prophet	 Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him.	 **	 The	
Jews	who	enquired	about	their	story.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 Yūsuf aur	 us	 ke	 bhāiyoñ	 meiñ	
pooñchne	wāloñ	ke	liye	nishāniyañ	haiñ
